titles.title: A bill to provide for additional criminal penalties for deported aliens who reenter the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 10/22/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to establish additional specified criminal penalties for an alien who reenters the United States after having been deported subsequent to conviction of a felony or aggravated felony.
